EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - What's New with 8.3.0? - Partners - 2014.10.29.Email - Thank You for A
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our What’s New in 8.3.0 Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: What’s New with 8.3.0
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for attending our ‘What’s New in 8.3.0’ Webinar, introducing all our new features and solutions for the 8.3.0 Release. We hope you enjoyed the webinar and are also excited to try out our new features. Your active participation and engaging questions helped to make the webinar lively and interesting. If you would like to stay up to date with current Tricentis news, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Learn more about our new features and solutions through our What’s New Videos, available here <http://www.tricentis.com/products/what-is-new>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Gerd Weishaar VP Product Management Tricentis
Roman Zednik Worldwide Director for Pre-Sales Consulting Tricentis
